name: The Complete Movie Games Collection
description:
The Complete Movie Games Collection includes: Lust from Beyond A Victorian mansion. A cult worshipping an otherworldly erotic deity. Among all that - you. Explore a world inspired by the works of Lovecraft, Giger, and Beksiński. See for yourself that there are no limits to dark ecstasy. Lust from Beyond: M Edition Descend into madness in a first-person survival horror inspired by Lovecraft and Giger. Solve the mystery of esoteric cults. Cross the gate to the blasphemous land of Lusst’ghaa. Play the new M-rated cut of the fan-favorite Lust from Beyond. Plane Mechanic Simulator England, 1940. The Luftwaffe is preparing for the invasion of Britain and the RAF need every man to stop it. They need you. Join the ground crews as they struggle to keep the aircraft flying. Repair engine, patch bullet holes, rearm machine guns and more. Brewpub Simulator Quit your day job, open a bar! Decorate the place, create your own beer and design your labels. Keep your kegs full and your customers happy, and never stop growing! Drug Dealer Simulator Have you ever thought about expanding your own crime empire, without the legal and moral consequences? SIMULATE IT! Crawl into the dark alleys of the drug dealing business. Now with SIX big free updates introducing new mechanics, maps, and dozens of gameplay hours. Beyond Sunset Cyberpunk first-person shooter with a rich story and RPG elements. You are Lucy, an enhanced street samurai searching for lost memories. Fight in large, open, interactive levels overtaken by yakuza, zombies, robots and bosses! Fire Commander See what it means to face the fire. Command a firefighting unit in an exciting tactical RTS. Save lives, manage your water supplies and care for your team in 30+ missions. Be a real hero! MythBusters: The Game - Crazy Experiments Simulator Be a MythBuster in front and behind the camera! The game is a first-person sim that adapts the famous Discovery show. Run crazy experiments and manage the production of episodes.

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.


Some of the games in this bundle may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
developers: Movie Games Lunarium, Cobble Games, Disaster Studio, Metacorp
Vaporware, Star Drifters, Atomic Wolf, Pixel Crow Games, Byterunners, Byte Barrel
